element.name: UltraKiller
element.description: You are a machine built for one singular purpose: HIGH OCTANE DEATH...

proficiencies.skills: Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation, Perception, Performance, Sleight of Hand, Stealth

equipment.option: (a) one simple firearm and a martial firearm or (b) one martial weapon and a shield
(c) leather armor and a martial firearm

tr.td: Blood Soak, Chassis Choice, Dodge Slide, Speed Machine

element.name: Blood Soak
element.description: Your system charges with each kill. Gain a resource on kill that fuels certain abilities. Refer to full class here: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Chassis Choice
element.description: Choose your subclass path at 1st level: V1, V2, or SwordMachine. Each chassis grants unique abilities. Full details: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Dodge Slide
element.description: As a reaction, you can make a high-speed slide that grants a bonus to AC or lets you reposition. Details at: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Speed Machine
element.description: Your movement is unmatched. Gain increasing bonuses to movement speed at each level. Refer to: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Hyper Evasion
element.description: Grants powerful dodge capabilities. Increases survivability in fast-paced combat. Full rules: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Fist of Pain
element.description: A powerful melee attack that benefits from your blood resource. More info: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Coinshot
element.description: Unique ranged attack involving coins. A stylish mechanic that rewards precision. See: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Whiplash
element.description: Grants a grappling hook-like ability for mobility and combat repositioning. Full mechanics: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Let There Be Blood
element.description: Unleash a massive burst of speed and violence using your stored blood. Details: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Hyper Dash
element.description: Grants extreme burst movement in combat, even through enemies. For exact rules: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Infinite Thrust
element.description: Combo chaining mobility attack. High damage, high velocity. Full explanation: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)

element.name: Bloody Comet
element.description: Projectile finisher ability that consumes stored resources. See: https://www.dandwiki.com/wiki/UltraKiller_(5e_Class)
